verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When either \w man|strong="H0376"\w* or \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* shall \w separate|strong="H6381"\w* \add themselves\add* to \w vow|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* of a \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w*, to \w separate|strong="H5144"\w* \add themselves\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 6.2 \ft to separate…: or, to make themselves Nazarites\f*

He shall \w separate|strong="H5144"\w* \add himself\add* from \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, and shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* no \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, or \w vinegar|strong="H2558"\w* of strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, neither shall he \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* any \w liquor|strong="H4952"\w* of \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, nor \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w moist|strong="H3892"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, or \w dried|strong="H3002"\w*.

All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* shall he \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* nothing that is \w made|strong="H6213"\w* of the \w vine|strong="H3196"\w* \w tree|strong="H1612"\w*, from the \w kernels|strong="H2785"\w* even to the \w husk|strong="H2085"\w*.\f + \fr 6.4 \ft separation: or, Nazariteship\f*\f + \fr 6.4 \ft vine…: Heb. vine of the wine\f*

All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* there shall no \w razor|strong="H8593"\w* \w come|strong="H5674"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: until the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* be \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*, in the which he \w separateth|strong="H5144"\w* \add himself\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he shall be \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \add and\add* shall let the \w locks|strong="H6545"\w* of the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* of his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w grow|strong="H1431"\w*.

All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w separateth|strong="H5144"\w* \add himself\add* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* at no \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*.

He shall not make himself \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w* for his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, or for his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, for his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, or for his \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, when they \w die|strong="H4194"\w*: because the \w consecration|strong="H5145"\w* of his \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 6.7 \ft consecration: Heb. separation\f*
All the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* he \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And if any \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w very|strong="H6621"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* by him, and he hath \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w consecration|strong="H5145"\w*; then he shall \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w cleansing|strong="H2893"\w*, on the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall he \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* it.

And on the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* he shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turtles|strong="H8449"\w*, or \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w pigeons|strong="H3123"\w*, to the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, to the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for him, for \w that|strong="H0834"\w* he \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* by the \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, and shall \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w* that same \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And he shall \w consecrate|strong="H5144"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*, and shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* for a trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*: but the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* that were \w before|strong="H7223"\w* shall be \w lost|strong="H5307"\w*, because his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* was \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*.\f + \fr 6.12 \ft be lost: Heb. fall\f*

¶ And this \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w*, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* are \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w*: he shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*:

And he shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* he \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* for a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* ewe \w lamb|strong="H3535"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1323"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* for a sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w* for peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*,

And a \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, \w cakes|strong="H2471"\w* of fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w* \w mingled|strong="H1101"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w wafers|strong="H7550"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and their meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* his sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*:

And he shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* \add for\add* a \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*: the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H6213"\w* also his meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and his drink \w offering|strong="H5262"\w*.

And the \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* shall \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* of the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* which \add is\add* under the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w sodden|strong="H1311"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H2220"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* out of the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w wafer|strong="H7550"\w*, and shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \add the hair of\add* his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w* is \w shaven|strong="H1548"\w*:

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w wave|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: this \add is\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* for the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, with the \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* and \w heave|strong="H8641"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w*: and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* may \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \w Nazarite|strong="H5139"\w* who hath \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*, \add and of\add* his \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* for his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*, beside \add that\add* that his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w get|strong="H5381"\w*: \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w vow|strong="H5088"\w* which he \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w*, so he must \w do|strong="H6213"\w* after the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of his \w separation|strong="H5145"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and unto his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, On this \w wise|strong="H3541"\w* ye shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w* unto them,
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee:
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* make his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w shine|strong="H0215"\w* upon thee, and be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto thee:
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* upon thee, and \w give|strong="H7760"\w* thee \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.
And they shall \w put|strong="H7760"\w* my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and I will \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* them.
